mapper.select: select c.id, c.user_id, c.goods_id, c.goods_count, c.choice_prop, c.shop_id,g.intro,g.name as goodsName,g.pic1,g.total_count,c.goods_count,g.price from t_cart c,t_goods g where user_id=#{userId} and c.shop_id=#{shopId} and c.goods_id=g.id
mapper.delete: delete from t_cart where user_id= #{userId} and shop_id= #{shopId}
